price: (Ingatlah), ketika Malaikat berkata, "Hai Maryam, sesungguhnya Allah menggembirakan kamu (dengan kelahiran seorang putra yang diciptakan) dengan kalimat195 (yang datang) dari-Nya, namanya Al-Masih ʻIsa putra Maryam, seorang terkemuka di dunia dan di akhirat dan termasuk orang-orang yang didekatkan (kepada Allah),
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكِ بِكَلِمَةٖ مِّنۡهُ ٱسۡمُهُ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ وَجِيهٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha yubashiruki bikalimatin min'hu us'muhu al-masīḥu ʿīsā ub'nu maryama wajīhan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamina al-muqarabīna
